create cdrs table: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS cdrs (label VARCHAR NOT NULL, sigma VARCHAR NOT NULL, ct VARCHAR NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (label, sigma)) ENGINE = MergeTree()
create raw_cdrs table: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS raw_cdrs (src VARCHAR NOT NULL, dst VARCHAR NOT NULL, ts VARCHAR NOT NULL, prev VARCHAR NOT NULL, curr VARCHAR NOT NULL, next VARCHAR NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (src, dst, ts)) ENGINE = MergeTree()
